answer: customers INNER JOIN yearmonth ON customers.CustomerID = yearmonth.CustomerID

CAST((SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'SME' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2013%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0)) - SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'SME' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0))) AS FLOAT) * 100 / SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'SME' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0))

CAST(SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'LAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2013%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0)) - SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'LAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0)) AS FLOAT) * 100 / SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'LAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0))

CAST(SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'KAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2013%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0)) - SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'KAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0)) AS FLOAT) * 100 / SUM(IIF(customers.Segment = 'KAM' AND yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%', yearmonth.Consumption, 0))
WHERE yearmonth.Date LIKE '2012%' OR yearmonth.Date LIKE '2013%'
